akn:section.akn:heading: Strategy to counter role of the People’s Republic of China in evasion of sanctions with respect to I

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general Not later than 120 days after April 24, 2024, the Secretary of State, in consultation with the heads of other appropriate Federal agencies, shall submit to the appropriate congressional committees a written strategy, and provide to those committees an accompanying briefing, on the role of the People’s Republic of China in evasion of sanctions imposed by the United States with respect to Iranian-origin petroleum products that includes an assessment of options—
(b) Elements The strategy required by subsection (a) shall include—
(c) Form The strategy required by subsection (a) shall be submitted in unclassified form, but may include a classified index.
